rows.label: qst105603_msg001
rows.name: 500年前の書類がある

rows.label: qst105603_msg002
rows.name: あの開かずの間か

rows.label: qst105603_msg003
rows.name:
カギを託そう――あれ？
ない！？

rows.label: qst105603_msg0001
rows.name: Zeke? What brings you here?

rows.label: qst105603_msg0002
rows.name:
Not for sightseeing, I can tell you
that. I'm here on behalf of Master
Liberbrant.

rows.label: qst105603_msg0003
rows.name:
Liberbrant... Now there's a name
I haven't heard in a while. What's
the occasion?

rows.label: qst105603_msg0004
rows.name:
Wait, you're actually going to listen
to me? Well there's a turn up for the
books.

rows.label: qst105603_msg0005
rows.name:
I am greatly indebted to Master
Liberbrant for his tutelage. It's
nothing to do with you.

rows.label: qst105603_msg0006
rows.name:
I guess he's Master to a lot of us,
huh? Anyway, there's only one
reason I'm here.

rows.label: qst105603_msg0007
rows.name:
I need you to lend me those
500-year-old records. You know
the ones.

rows.label: qst105603_msg0008
rows.name:
The ones that detail the truth about
Luxuria.

rows.label: qst105603_msg0009
rows.name: ...Why?

rows.label: qst105603_msg0010
rows.name: It's for Master...and for the state.

rows.label: qst105603_msg0011
rows.name:
Everyone's started talking about
the connection between Adel
and Luxuria...

rows.label: qst105603_msg0012
rows.name:
Master feels betrayed, and so do the
people. Finding out everything they
believed in all these years was a lie...

rows.label: qst105603_msg0013
rows.name:
It's not an easy thing to accept. And
now they're starting to turn a blind eye
to it. Refusing to believe the facts.

rows.label: qst105603_msg0014
rows.name:
We've got to nip it in the bud before
it gets out of hand, Dad.

rows.label: qst105603_msg0015
rows.name:
You know me. I hate to leave things
unfinished.

rows.label: qst105603_msg0016
rows.name: ...All right.

rows.label: qst105603_msg0017
rows.name:
You'll find the records in the Hall of
Honor, not the room I showed you
before. Look for a vault on... Hm?

rows.label: qst105603_msg0018
rows.name: Yeah?

rows.label: qst105603_msg0019
rows.name:
Normally, I would have the key on
my person...

rows.label: qst105603_msg0020
rows.name: But...?

rows.label: qst105603_msg0021
rows.name:
But...the chain appears to have
been cut.

rows.label: qst105603_msg0022
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]What?! It's one thing after
another, isn't it?

rows.label: qst105603_msg0023
rows.name:
Your Highness! You mustn't let your
temper flare in front of His Majesty!

rows.label: qst105603_msg0024
rows.name: You...dropped it?

rows.label: qst105603_msg0025
rows.name:
You'd have to be a total numpty to go
and lose something that important!

rows.label: qst105603_msg0026
rows.name: Your Highness! Language!

rows.label: qst105603_msg0027
rows.name:
Your Majesty...would you happen
to know where you might have
dropped it?

rows.label: qst105603_msg0028
rows.name: Let's see...

rows.label: qst105603_msg0029
rows.name:
I got up, washed my face, got dressed,
had breakfast...and then sat down here.

rows.label: qst105603_msg0030
rows.name:
After meals, I always go for a stroll
around the castle. Today, as I recall...

rows.label: qst105603_msg0031
rows.name:
I went from the Hall of Reception to
the Hall of Plenty, briefly perused the
Hall of Virtue, and then came back.

rows.label: qst105603_msg0032
rows.name:
So basically you were wandering
around the basement.

rows.label: qst105603_msg0033
rows.name: Indeed. I did not leave the premises.

rows.label: qst105603_msg0034
rows.name:
Fine. Whatever. We'll go and have
a look around the castle then...
